meanings.definition: The state of being without hair.
meanings.sent1: The hairlessness of the sphinx cat makes it unique among felines.
meanings.sent2: The hairlessness of the newborn baby surprised the parents.
meanings.sent3: The hairlessness of the peach felt like a smooth surprise.
meanings.sent4: The hairlessness of the desert landscape was stark and unforgiving.
meanings.sent5: The hairlessness of the man's head was a striking contrast to his bushy beard.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of lacking hair.
meanings.sent1: The hairlessness of the bald eagle symbolizes strength and freedom.
meanings.sent2: The hairlessness of the dog breed made it easier to groom.
meanings.sent3: The hairlessness of the potato felt oddly amusing to the farmer.
meanings.sent4: The hairlessness of the mountain peak was a metaphor for purity.
meanings.sent5: The hairlessness of the statue's head made it seem ancient and weathered.
